name: Bata Casual Sandel
product_ditails: Elevate your style with this Bata men's loafer. You can use it both formally and casually because this loafer can be a nice bridge between casual and formal. The sole is made of TPR which gives you a strong grip even on muddy roads allowing you to walk confidently in any weather. TPR is washable unlike leather soles and also more durable. It can be perfect for business meetings, office hours, and formal or informal occasions.
